name: Paws Of The West
description:
"Mad Dog has taken another life... this town needs a new deputy..."

                                                                                                        - Mayor Calico

Paws of the West is a brand new NES game that will actually play on the NES console! 

Current wild west games for the NES are very linear and arcade-like. We decided to do things differently and provide you an open world action-adventure experience set in the wild west!

You will find many places to explore, lovable characters to interact with, loads of enemies to shoot, an appropriately themed soundtrack, and a detailed story, all packed in a beautiful black & white setting!

You play as Rowland, the new deputy. His dream is to one day protect townsfolk in need of help. Armed with his trusty 6-shooter and his tenaciousness , his dream is about to come true...

I can't wait for you all to join Rowland on his new timeless adventure!

How do I play???

  • The best way to play this game is on the actual NES!!! If you have an "everdrive" cartridge with the latest firmware, you can just load the game (PawsOfTheWest.nes) onto the SD card and play!
  • If you are on a PC, then you can use an emulator like Mesen! https://www.mesen.ca/
  • If you are on raspberry pi, retro pi, or other emulation station, then follow your platform's instructions on how to add ROMs. You might need additional files to support mapper-30 ROMs.

Please let me know if you have any questions or issues and I will be happy to help!!!

Credits

  • Cover art, titlescreen art, cutscene art, and game idea: craftylarkcreations. Find her AMAZING creations here: https://www.instagram.com/craftylarkcreations/
  • Tiles were derived and modified from the following artists from OpenGameArt:
    - https://opengameart.org/content/tileset-1bit-color
    - 1bit 16x16 Indoor Tileset by Dennis Payne (https://opengameart.org/content/1bit-16x16-indoor-tileset)
  • Additional tiles were derived and modified from: https://kronbits.itch.io/1bit-game-assets (license purchased)
  • Game was made with nesmaker! You can start making really actual NES games here!! https://www.thenew8bitheroes.com/
  • Game programmed and music made by Kevin Neilson
